These scourges of the seas are a threat to anyone who spends time away from land. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Pirate](/NPCs.aspx?ID=952) **Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 242 **Perception** +6 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8 **Str** +2 **Dex** +3 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +2 **Items** cutlass (functions as a [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Padded Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +8 **Will** +6 **HP** 32 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Bravery** When the pirate rolls a success on a Will save against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, anytime they gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition, reduce its value by 1. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** cutlass +10 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 1d6+5 slashing **Melee** dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+5 piercing **Ranged** dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+5 piercing **Boarding Action** The pirate swings on a rope or Strides, moving up to double their Speed. If the pirate boarded or disembarked a boat during this movement, they can make a melee Strike at the end of their movement that deals one extra damage die on a hit.
